name: Tissot, Women and Time

address.streetAddress: 317 Dundas St W, Downtown Toronto, ON M5T 1G4, Canada

description: Exploring the many ways that the French artist James Tissot represented modern women and envisioned their relationship to time during the last decades of the nineteenth century. This exhibition presents two of the AGOâ€™s most beloved Tissot paintings alongside a selection of more than 40 works on paper donated by Allan and Sondra Gotlieb.
